title: Too funny
author: VD
content_html:
I suppose one could never really hope to compete with Me So Michelle:

I’m not so much mad at Fox as sad for us all: It’s sad they do have to do these things for ratings. Michelle Malkin had to do an Anna Nicole segment last night when she filled in for O’Reilly.

Now THAT is truly funny. They’re gen-u-wine intellectuals, they are, these leaders of the conservatariat.

We see her here
We see her there
We can’t escape her anywhere.
Is she on Fox? Now CNN?
That media ho M. Malkin.



From defending internment to discussing dead Playmates… that’s simply perfect.

hope to compete with Me So Michelle
